comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: The Hot food on the Stove was usually brought by a Mother or the Teacher.  Mothers would take their turn to bring hot food for the School Kids.   In some parts of America the Lunch brought from home was very little.   I know one Little Boy who would bring his scanty lunch in an old Syrup pail.    He  tried to trade  his Brown Sugar sandwich for a sandwich with meat.   There was no  trade and he ended up eating his dried out bread with brown sugar on it.     I wrote the sad, story called:  The Brown Sugar Sandwich.     This is a Great Photo of DAYS GONE BY !

comment.author: 7389807@N06
comment._content: This is a wonderful photo! I wish I could go up and examine that map on the wall. Wonder what she is heating up for lunch? :)
